title: Thruster Water Ingress Response
purpose: Stabilize a thruster after suspected water ingress.
Prevent further damage and document findings.
safety: Isolate electrical power to the thruster.
Handle wet components with insulated gloves.

steps.title: Isolate and drain
text: Secure the ROV and isolate thruster power.
Open drain ports if present and collect any water.

steps.title: Inspect internals
text: Remove the cover and inspect for corrosion or debris.
Dry components gently; avoid overheating coils.

steps.title: Test and document
text: Perform insulation resistance test once dry.
Document readings and any corrosion observed.

notes: Escalate if readings remain low; replace seals before next dive.
